strings.Value: "You should listen to your ancestors. If you don't trust their wisdom, you should at least avoid their wrath!"
"Tassath is right. You should think for yourself."
"If you can't decide, just flip a coin."
[Attack] "You annoy me. I suppose I'll just have to kill you all."

{n}Two lizardfolk stand near a small garden, arguing fiercely as they wave their hands and lash the ground with their tails.{/n} "What you say is stupid, any fool understand it! Even warmblood!" {n}The lizardfolk points at you with his talony finger.{/n} "Hey, you, warmblood! Come here and tell this bonehead I speak truth!"
"We two, Tassath and Shalur, make garden. Good garden, lots heal-herb. Then Great Ancestor come. Tell us root out all heal-herb and plant dope-weed instead! How can that be?"
"Disobey ancestor is wrong, ancestor must be respected! Ancestor wise, knows better! We like small children, know nothing, yes! Must not argue, must do as told!"
"Shalur maybe know nothing, but Tassath can use his head! Root out heal-herb wrong â€” plant dope-weed wrong! Tassath think Great Ancestor eat too much dope-weed himself!"
{n}Tassath retracts his head apprehensively, while Shalur gives you a gloomy nod.{/n} "Here! Beware ancestor, respect ancestor! Even warmblood know it, yes!"

{n}Shalur mumbles, displeased, while Tassath lifts his finger in triumph.{/n} "See, yes? If ancestor tell go jump from big-big rock, you obey him too? Ancestor not planted this garden, it not up to him what we do with it!"
{n}The lizardfolk argue a little about who gets heads and who gets tails before they finally flip a coin.{/n}
"Look, Tassath right! Coin tell the truth, yes! If ancestor want dope-weed, let him plant it himself!"
"Shalur told you, and you did not believe! Now coin tells you so! Stop being stubborn and go root out your herbs, before something bad happen!"
